vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting the renewal of Specific Use Permit No. 2389 for a commercial amusement (inside) on property zoned a CC Community Commercial Subdistrict within Planned Development District No. 595, the South Dallas/Fair Park Special Purpose District, at the southeast corner of South Malcolm X Boulevard and Birmingham Avenue
Recommendation of Staff: Approval for a three-year period, subject to revised conditions
Recommendation of CPC: Approval for a three-year period, subject to revised conditions
Z212-313(RM)
Note: This item was deferred by the City Council before opening the public hearing on March 8, 2023 and is scheduled for consideration on April 26, 2023.
